## Load libraries

```{r}
library("rnaturalearth")
library("rnaturalearthdata")
library("ggplot2")
```

## Map of Non Human Primates

```{r}
# Load the world map
world = ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")

# Set the countries of the study
NHP_countries=c("CÃ´te d'Ivoire", "Germany", "Dem. Rep. Congo","Gabon", "Uganda", "United States of America","Czechia","South Africa", "Vietnam", "Austria","Tanzania","China","Kenya","Cameroon","Netherlands","Singapore","Argentina", "Nicaragua", "Mexico", "Colombia", "Ecuador", "Uganda", "Madagascar", "Central African Rep.", "Ethiopia", "Congo")
NHPCountries = world$name %in% NHP_countries

# Plot
ggplot(data = world) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = NHPCountries)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "#F87666", "FALSE" = "#EBEBEB")) +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = gray(.5), linetype = "dashed", size = 0.5),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#EBEBEB"),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none")

ggsave("./Graficas/NHP_map.png",height = 8, width = 18,dpi=600)
```

## Map of Non Human Primates and Humans

```{r}
# Set the countries of the study
H_countries=c("Sweden","Fiji","Nepal","Tanzania","Brazil","Italy","Colombia","India","Australia","Cameroon","Austria","Russia","Singapore","Argentina","Spain","United Kingdom","United States of America","Burkina Faso","South Korea","Kazakhstan","Denmark","Bangladesh","Mongolia","Japan","Peru","Madagascar","El Salvador","Canada","Netherlands","Luxembourg","Central African Rep.","Ireland","Gabon","Germany","Vietnam","South Africa","Malaysia","Ethiopia","Ghana","China","Guinea-Bissau","Mexico","Israel","France")
HCountries = world$name %in% H_countries

# Group the countries by its presence in the studies
Datasets = ifelse(NHPCountries & HCountries, "Both", ifelse(NHPCountries, "NonHumanPrimates", ifelse(HCountries, "Human", "None")))

# Plot
ggplot(data = world) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = Datasets)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Both" = "#210B2C", "NonHumanPrimates" = "#F87666", "Human" = "#598392", "None" = "#EBEBEB")) +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-180, 180), ylim = c(-60, 90), expand = FALSE) +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = gray(.5), linetype = "dashed", size = 0.5),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#EBEBEB"),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank())

ggsave("./Graficas/world_map.png",height = 8, width = 18,dpi=600)
```
